title: How can i get a pbe ?
body: Help if you can lend me A PBE or something.

replies.body: We can't force or expedite PBE applications, but you can [sign up here](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe).  I don't have information on getting in beyond what's in our [PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ).  I hope that helps, and best of luck with your application!
